conversation.content: It seems like you're hesitant about the commitment. Would you like to discuss more flexible plans?
Yeah, I'm just worried about the cost. As someone with diabetes, medical expenses can be overwhelming. Can you tell me more about these flexible plans? Are they really affordable?

Absolutely, Maria. FWD's Set-for-Life insurance plan offers several affordable options that can be tailored to specifically accommodate your medical needs and budget, ensuring you get the coverage you need without additional financial stress.
That sounds promising! But how do I know which option is best for me? And what kind of coverage does it provide exactly?

We can schedule a personalized consultation to discuss your specific situation and explore the best options. The Set-for-Life insurance provides comprehensive coverage including hospitalization, outpatient treatments, and specialized care for chronic conditions like diabetes, ensuring you’re covered for both routine and unexpected medical expenses.
I'd appreciate that. It would help put my mind at ease knowing I've got a safety net in case something happens. When can we set up this consultation?
How about we meet next Tuesday at your convenience? I can make myself available at any time that works best for you to go through everything in detail.
Sounds good. How about 2 pm? That should give me enough time to wrap up some work before our meeting.
Perfect, Maria. I’ve scheduled our consultation for next Tuesday at 2 pm. I look forward to helping you find the right plan for your needs.
Thank you so much! I’m looking forward to it too.
You're welcome! If you have any more questions before our meeting, feel free to reach out. See you next Tuesday at 2 pm! Have a great day.
Will do. Thanks again for your help. You too!
You're very welcome! Take care and talk soon!
You too!
Thank you! Have a great day!
You’re welcome!
Thank you! If there's anything else I can assist you with in the meantime, just let me know. Have a great day!
You’re welcome!
Have a wonderful day! If you need anything, just reach out. Take care!
You too!
Thank you! Enjoy your day!

detection_result.rationale: Maria's response 'You too!' is a common and natural way for a customer to reciprocate good wishes. It directly follows Alex's 'Enjoy your day!' and doesn't exhibit any characteristics that would be unusual for a customer in this context. The response is brief, friendly, and appropriate, maintaining the expected customer role in the conversation.
